title:
Fixed point ratios, Sylow numbers and coverings of $p$-elements in
  finite groups
authors:
Robert M. Guralnick, Attila Mar\'oti, Juan Mart\'inez Madrid,
  Alexander Moret\'o and Noelia Rizo
abstract:
Fixed point ratios for primitive permutation groups have been extensively
studied. Relying on a recent work of Burness and Guralnick, we obtain further
results in the area. For a prime $p$ and a finite group $G$, we use fixed point
ratios to study the number of Sylow $p$-subgroups of $G$ and the minimal size
of a covering by proper subgroups of the set of $p$-elements of $G$.
